Katensa:
You must be in a hurry. Anyway, the reward items are as follows: You can choose an item of your choice if you have enough Mucrokian Hide or Mutated Mucrokian Hide.
Mutated Mucrokian Hide will be double the price of other hides. Except, Mutated Mucrokian Hide will be settled first during the settlement.
What would you like?
Recipe - Sealed Dynasty Earring (70%)(require 346 Mucrokian Skins)
Recipe - Sealed Dynasty Necklace (70%)(require 462 Mucrokian Skins)
Recipe - Sealed Dynasty Ring (70%)(require 232 Mucrokian Skins)
Recipe - Sealed Dynasty Sigil (60%)(require 372 Mucrokian Skins)
